titleInfo.title: Country Music Spectacular with Jim Ed Brown and More at War Memorial Auditorium Layout (18187)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing a Country Music Spectacular featuring Jim Ed Brown, Grandpa Jones, Duke of Paducah, Stu Phillips, Jean Shepard, Del Wood, and the Ralph Sloan Dancers at War Memorial Auditorium on October 8. Poster features metal photoplates of all the performers. Notes are written along the bottom. To see the business record associated with this poster layout, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/43367/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
